name: Lucious' Christmas Adventure
description:
This is a gift I made for my partner for Christmas, 2019. We have a bunch of cats together, and whenever they're out  of their enclosure, one of them has a habit of sneaking out and escaping over fences into neighbours' yards. Taking these escapes as an inspiration,  this is a gamified version of one such escape by Lucious.

(Real-life Lucious having a nap after his adventures)

Made by Soundole in Pico-8.
